O jogo em si é muito bom, é uma pena que esteja bugado na parte de sincronização de rede, eu gostaria de stremar ele, mas fica sem graça pois no final de quase toda partida buga, não recebo os BP e o pior de tudo é que o erro aparece numa caixa preta enorme, então não dá nem pra ver direito o resultado da partida.
Not giving this recommended until Quentin receives his face lift or they give Jake a maid costume.

Jogo muito bom, mesmo sem jogar com os amigos sozinho apesar de as vezes ser frustrante vai melhorando conforme vc sobe no ranking, jogabilidade boa tanto do killer quanto dos survivors.
Mas n vai achando que é fácil decidir começar a jogar isso n, a quantidade de bugs e erros no jogo sempre vem com novas atualizações isso sem falar no quanto a comunidade desse jogo é toxica principalmente se vc vai jogar de killer, uma dica é se vc tem muita ansiedade ou auto estima baixa n recomendo. Maaaas se vc conseguir aguentar os erros e a comunidade recomendo e muito esse game.

Ogólnie nie mam pojęcia o co chodzi w tej grze bo wygrałam ją w kulkach za 5 zł.
Trochę się cykam grać w to bo jak mnie jakiś oponent chwyca i wiesza na haku to mi się lekko przykro robi a jak jeszcze mama wejdzie do pokoju i zobaczy że gram o 2 w nocy to prawdopodobnie zamknie mnie w piwnicy bo mam 6 lat i nie mogę grać w takie horrory. :(
Bardzo podobają mi się skiny do postaci bo są kolorowe ale nie wiem po chuj robią takie skiny jak przez to postać jest bardziej widoczna w tym buszu.Nie wiem po co robię recenzje ale mam nadzieje że wam się ona spodoba i uznacie ją za przydatną.Nie polecam tej gry dla osób młodych z uwagi na to że jest bardzo straszna i występuje w niej dużo przemocy i morderstw.

This game has always had its ups and downs, between matchmaking taking hours to the enormous amount of bugs in the game. This new matchmaking update, though has made me stop enjoying the game entirely. I'm getting matched with people who are way above my skill level and they are just stomping me. If you want to eanjoy your time with a game look elsewhere because they just toss this one in the bin with this latest update.
New MMR System is truly one of the worse things they have implemented in DBD.

Nach 20 Stunden spielen muss man sagen ist nen gutes Game.
Als Surv ist es leider jedoch so, dass ich nach 5 erfolgreichen Partien unter gleichgesinnten (Alle auf Rang 17-20 inklusive Killer) nur noch in Runden mit Level 1-4 Survs und Killer mit dem Level 1-5 komme.

Das ist sowohl für einen Anfänger (wie mich) als auch für die Jungs und Mädels  mit höheren Rängen einfach mist.
Die sind Sauer warum die nen Noob in ihrer 3er Premade Gruppe haben und ich rege mich auf weil ich die erfahrenen Killer kaum bis garnicht geloopt bekomme. Hinzu kommt dann auch noch, dass meine Perks aufgrund der noch fehlenden DLC´s nicht grad die besten sind. Man könnte also meinen das Matchmaking sollte ein wenig überarbeitet werden. Dies könnte den Spielspaß bestimmt ein wenig steigern.

PS: Welcher Entwickler hat sich Leatherface ausgedacht. Das Facecampen am Haken ist ja absolut Gift für das Spiel.
Ein Nerf welcher die Oneshot-Fähigkeit  im 5m Umkreis um den Haken (Keller ausgenommen) einschränkt wäre in meinen Augen nen fairer Weg und würde meist nur die Camper-Bubbas hart treffen.
Все бомба, но некоторые карты не оч.
Nices spiel in das man gerne ein paar 100 spielstunden stecken kann.

This game has many great features for you to enjoy! First off I love how when you go over a pallet or window, 30 feet away from a killer, the killer can still lunge and hit you! THATS A GREAT MECHANIC!!! I also love how balanced the perks, maps, and killer abilities are, you can really tell that the developers have thought out and planed ahead when updating or releasing new content. over all this game is a 10/10 in all categories and I would recommend it to everyone. (If you play Ghostface, Nurse, or Legion your trash)

There is currently a MAJOR bug with in the game that is causing people to get not get blood points and ranks. It has been going on since the recent patch (7/28/2020) and there is NO FIX. The devs are not talking about the issue, and the forums are blowing up over it. The only thing we get is: "The devs are aware of it." This is a game breaking bug for some.

Edit: Had the date wrong.

Подбор игроков ужасен: ты можешь быть 16 ранга, а к тебе будет кидать ранги 1-3. Особенно это печально, когда ты решаешь протестить новых убийц - ты просто не в состоянии что-либо сделать...
Порой случаются баги/лаги из-за чего выжившие могут телепортироваться на небольшие расстояния, но, обычно, это происходит уже после того, как они падают.
После сброса рангов (каждое 13-е) играть совсем не комфортно - те, кто были 1-3 стали 4-8 и шансы с ними встретиться возрастают.  Игроки, которые играют ради удовольствия, а не ради ранга, будут иметь не очень хороший игровой опыт
Спасибо папаша, за частые вылеты, ранг сказал мне, чао персик, дозревай
Het is leuk totdat je een kut update krijgt die het niet wil doen :D

Не знаю что написать, поэтому напишу рецепт голубцов.
Капуста - 1 кочан
Рис - 200 г
Фарш мясной - 500 г
Соль - 1 ч. ложка
Приправа - 1 ч. ложка (по вкусу)
Перец черный молотый - по вкусу
Масло растительное - для жарки
Для соуса:
Сметана - 2 ч. ложки
Томатная паста или кетчуп - 2 ч. ложки
Приправа - 1 ч. ложка (по вкусу)
Соевый соус - 1 ч. ложка
Соль - 0,5 ч. ложки
Вода - 0,5-0,75 стакана
Понравилось всё, кроме некоторых просто уебских карт

My tilted yet not less honest opinion about dbd: I've played it for about 3 years and yes, it is very addictive. Yet heroine is addictive too and that does not mean it is good or healthy. Until I played dbd, I had never become really angry, frustrated or salty in a game. Its community is highly toxic and the game is designed to support and promote toxicity and dirty play, mostly on the killers side. You will be completely helpless in the hands of mentally unstable players who don't play for fun, but only to ruin other players' experience and win at any price: zero sportsmanship and tons of camping and tunneling. The devs dont care about this. You will notice my only vac ban on Steam: it's not for hacking, it's for becoming salty with a killer that has the worst reputation ever after 5k hours played and who camped and tunneled everyone as hard as he could, then he pulled my tongue on steam chat so I went salty with him, told him a few truths and he reported me to the devs. Then I got the permanent ban. When this player saw my ban, he started humiliating, insulting and mocking me on steam chat together with a friend who added me too. I wrote to the devs protesting and submitting screenshots with their insults and laughs at my ban, and I gave them the steamid64 of the player who was doing this to me. I admitted to having been salty and promised that I would bite my tongue with toxic players like these and that I didnt want revenge, only justice. They didn't care at all. So this is like smoking or drugs: they may give you some dark pleasure but, honestly, if you are happy without that in your life, avoid at all cost. I tend to look on the bright side of things and will use this as an opportunity to get unhooked from the game and try to forget the bitter taste it leaves and little satisfaction it gives. I couldn't regret more ever having considered playing this game. Yeah, you might say, a game's just a game. Well, football or any other sport also is, and we enjoy games when they are played with a sense of honour and sportsmanship. Dbd is a magnet for psychos and mentally unstable people like the player who got me banned. Save your money and play something else. I've known of dozens of people who have uninstalled out of sheer frustration at toxicity and devs' denial to do anything. They are not any better than the toxic players they promote and support, and hear this: dbd will die out of toxicity. Avoid.

The real horror is the friends you make along the way

If you like horror games and maybe even a fan of horror movies this game is for you. Game itself is really good.But if you play as survivor then you can meet many killers who camp and tunnel  and that will  ruin all your fun. Decision depends on you but there is no chance that you won't meet any campers or tunnelers so be prepared because you will probably get upset.

P.S. Camping means staying near hooked survivor, not chasing other survivors, and not letting unhook hooked survivor. Tunneling means chasing only one survivor to death and not others.

O jogo nao e para iniciantes! pareamento horrivel, voce começa hoje e ja pega killers maximizados, nao duram nem 5 minutos uma partida, fiquei o dia inteiro sem encontrar killers leveis baixo tambem para ter um balanceamento e chance de sobreviver, o jogo de obriga a se arrepender de compra lo, pior pareamento que ja vi em jogos, desbalanceado inicialmente, favorecendo a killers com anos de jogo, nao comprem se voce comecar do zero.
